backend/main.mo: Defines the main backend canister with product, orders, admin, customer, and session data types along with maps and state variables.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features, related files, components, test IDs, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for various frontend files used across the application.
frontend/.redeploy-trigger: Metadata file that forces a rebuild and deployment without code changes.
frontend/docs/custom-domain.md: Documentation explaining how to configure and register a custom domain for the deployed app.
frontend/docs/rebuild-redeploy.md: Guide describing how to trigger and verify a fresh rebuild and redeployment process.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining color themes, typography, neon theme variables, and component layering rules.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document mounting the root React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures router, query client, global neon background, and top-level layout with routed pages.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminAcces: Admin login gate that validates admin sessions, shows login UI, and renders protected content when authenticated.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoute: Guards admin routes by validating session status, showing a loader during validation and redirecting unauthenticated users.
frontend/src/components/admin/dashboard/: Provides the main admin layout with sidebar navigation, mobile drawer, and logout handling.
Displays a customer list with name, contact, order count, and total spent, showing skeletons while loading.
Shows admin dashboard stats and low‑stock alerts, using fetched summary data and loading skeletons.
Lists orders with status controls, customer info, and a dialog for viewing details, supporting status updates.
Manages product creation, editing, and deletion with forms, dialogs, validations, and image upload handling.
Allows editing store contact info and branding images with validation and update submission.
frontend/src/components/auth/CustomerLog: Customer login dialog handling email-based auth, address management, and order viewing with neon UI styling.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Button that toggles Internet Identity login/logout and handles authentication errors.
frontend/src/components/brand/BrandPrimi: Reusable branding components like Section, Container, Card, Badge, and Button with themed styling.
frontend/src/components/brand/GlobalNeon: Global animated neon background reacting to reduced-motion preferences.
frontend/src/components/brand/NeonSurfac: Wrapper providing neon animated background layers around arbitrary content.
frontend/src/components/cart/CartSheet.t: Slide-out cart UI enabling quantity changes, item removal, and checkout with neon visuals.
frontend/src/components/common/DrawerClo: Icon button for closing drawer or sheet components.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer with brand info, social links, newsletter signup, and dynamic settings parsing.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Main site header with navigation, cart access, login triggers, and mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Layout wrapper rendering the header except on admin routes.
frontend/src/components/news/NewsCard.ts: Card showing a product update with type badge, date, title, and preview text.
frontend/src/components/orders/DeliveryA: Form component for editing and validating delivery address fields and submitting the result.
frontend/src/components/orders/PlaceOrde: Dialog for selecting or adding an address and placing an order, handling authentication and cart submission.
frontend/src/components/products/PriceDi: Displays product pricing with discount and formatting options.
frontend/src/components/products/Product: Product listing card showing image, details, availability, and price with navigation to the product page.
frontend/src/components/products/Purchas: Disabled purchase UI indicating checkout is not yet available.
frontend/src/components/products/Variant: Selector for weight or flavor variants that updates the chosen variant and its price.
frontend/src/config/owner.ts: Defines the owner principal and helper to check admin ownership.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminCustomers.ts: Aggregates order data into a customer list with order counts and total spending.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminDashboardData: Computes admin dashboard metrics including product counts, low stock items, recent orders, and totals.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminOrders.ts: Fetches all admin orders and provides a mutation to update order status with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminProducts.ts: Provides React Query mutations for creating, updating, and deleting products, including image upload handling and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminSession.ts: Manages admin session state with localStorage, validation, login, and logout using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminStoreSettings: Fetches and updates store settings with optional image uploads, caching, and parsing of stored JSON fields.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Implements a localStorage-backed shopping cart with item management, totals, and bigint-safe serialization.
Handles customer address retrieval, saving, and deletion via authenticated backend calls with React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useCustomerOrders.ts: Fetches authenticated customer orders with live-update support using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useCustomerSession.ts: Manages customer session persistence, validation, login, and logout using localStorage and backend checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context providing identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsAdminRoute.ts: Detects whether the current pathname starts with /admin using the router location.
frontend/src/hooks/useLiveUpdateConfig.t: Provides default refetch settings for live update queries.
frontend/src/hooks/usePageMeta.ts: Sets document title and description, with special handling for the Web Owner Dashboard title.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating products, updates, and user profiles from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useStoreSettings.ts: Fetches store settings with caching and exposes loading and error state.
frontend/src/index.css: Imports the global stylesheet from the parent directory.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers and renders App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Empty page placeholder for the About page.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard router that gates access and switches between dashboard sections.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLogoPage.t: Empty admin logo management page placeholder.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminNewsPage.t: Empty admin news management page placeholder.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSiteSettin: Empty admin site settings page placeholder.
frontend/src/pages/CertificationsPage.ts: Empty page placeholder for the Certifications page.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Empty page placeholder for the Contact page.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the homepage with hero content, trust highlights, and navigation actions.
frontend/src/pages/NewsDetailPage.tsx: Shows details of a specific product update, including metadata, date, and related product info.
frontend/src/pages/NewsPage.tsx: Lists product updates with filtering tabs and live update timestamps.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Renders the privacy policy content with sections and metadata setup.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed product info with variant selection, quantity controls, and add‑to‑cart handling.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Lists products with category tabs, fetches category-specific data, and shows last-updated time.
frontend/src/pages/TermsPage.tsx: Renders the site's terms and conditions with meta tags and styled content sections.
frontend/src/utils/assets.ts: Provides URL normalization for asset filenames by encoding only the final path segment.
frontend/src/utils/externalBlob.ts: Converts files to bytes and simulates blob uploads by generating object URLs.
frontend/src/utils/jpeg.ts: Validates JPEG files and reads them as byte arrays.
frontend/src/utils/price.ts: Helpers for formatting INR prices, detecting discounts, and generating display price info.
frontend/src/utils/principal.ts: Validates and formats Dfinity principals with error handling and truncation.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters with session storage support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions for colors, fonts, shadows, animations, and content paths, plus plugins for animations and typography.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing UI enhancement tasks, including a global neon/glow background and functional sidebar close animation, along with notes, issues, and feature requests.
